entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023
